words.source: H7200 (ra'ah, waw-consecutive Niphal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to appear/be seen'; KJV 'appeared', ESV 'appeared', NASB 'appeared'
H4397 (mal'ak, noun common ms construct) 'angel/messenger'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the angel of'
H3068 (YHWH, proper noun) the divine name; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H413 ('el, preposition + 3ms suffix) 'to him'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'to him'
H3827 (labbat, noun common fs construct with preposition beth) 'flame'; KJV 'in a flame of', ESV 'in a flame of', NASB 'in a blazing'
H784 ('esh, noun common both singular absolute) 'fire'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'fire'
H8432 (tavek, noun common ms construct with preposition min) 'midst/middle'; KJV 'out of the midst of', ESV 'out of', NASB 'from the midst of'
H5572 (seneh, noun common ms absolute with definite article) 'bush/thornbush'; KJV/ESV 'the bush', NASB 'the bush'
H7200 (ra'ah, waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to see/look'; KJV 'he looked', ESV 'he looked', NASB 'he looked'
H2009 (hinneh, demonstrative particle with conjunctive waw) 'behold'; KJV 'and, behold', ESV 'and behold', NASB 'and behold'
H5572 (seneh, noun common ms absolute with definite article) 'the bush'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the bush'
H1197 (ba'ar, Qal active participle ms absolute) 'to burn/blaze'; KJV 'burned', ESV 'was burning', NASB 'was burning'
H784 ('esh, noun common both singular absolute with preposition beth + article) 'in/with fire'; KJV 'with fire', ESV 'yet', NASB 'with fire'
H5572 (seneh, noun common ms absolute with conjunctive waw + definite article) 'and the bush'; KJV 'and the bush', ESV 'the bush', NASB 'yet the bush'
H369 ('ayin, particle of negation + 3ms suffix) 'was not'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'was not'
H398 ('akal, Qal passive participle ms absolute) 'consumed/eaten'; rare passive form; KJV/ESV/NASB 'consumed'
